item.title: Narendra Modi interacts with students on Teachers Day bats for skillbased education
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed students across the nation on the occasion of Teachers Day On Twitter Modi said we salute all the teachers Live blog inside Vote Rate PM Modis interaction with students on a scale of 1 to 5
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed students across the nation on the occasion of Teachers Day On Twitter Modi said we salute all the teachers Live blog inside Vote Rate PM Modis interaction with students on a scale of 1 to 5
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed students across the nation on the occasion of Teachers Day On Twitter Modi said we salute all the teachers Live blog inside Vote Rate PM Modis interaction with students on a scale of 1 to 5

item.title: Kanpur Engg student commits suicide after ragging
item.description: 22yearold Himanshu Vishwakarma a student of mechanical engineering at Government Polytechnic College in Kanpur committed suicide in his hostel room on September 3 after being ragged and beaten up by his seniors superintendent of police rural A K Mishra said

item.title: Kerala district collector shows the way to physical fitness
item.description: At least once a week collector Ajit Kumar will be walking down from his official residence to the place of work five kms awaynbspHe has also requested all his officers who are staying in the 5 km radius of the collectorate to dump their vehicles and set a standard
item.itunes:subtitle: At least once a week collector Ajit Kumar will be walking down from his official residence to the place of work five kms awaynbspHe has also requested all his officers who are staying in the 5 km radius of the collectorate to dump their vehicles and set a

item.title: Doval to visit Beijing ahead of Xis India trip
item.description: National security advisor Ajit Doval will visit Beijing next week for talks with Chinese leaders ahead of President Xi Jinpings visit to India later this month
item.itunes:subtitle: National security advisor Ajit Doval will visit Beijing next week for talks with Chinese leaders ahead of President Xi Jinpings visit to India later this month
item.itunes:summary: National security advisor Ajit Doval will visit Beijing next week for talks with Chinese leaders ahead of President Xi Jinpings visit to India later this month

item.title: India at a hard line with Love Jihad and religious conversion
item.description: Fired up and full of vitriol Hindu activist Rajeshwar Singh is on a mission to end centuries of religious diversity in India one conversion at a time We will cleanse our Hindu society he said
item.itunes:subtitle: Fired up and full of vitriol Hindu activist Rajeshwar Singh is on a mission to end centuries of religious diversity in India one conversion at a time We will cleanse our Hindu society he said
item.itunes:summary: Fired up and full of vitriol Hindu activist Rajeshwar Singh is on a mission to end centuries of religious diversity in India one conversion at a time We will cleanse our Hindu society he said

item.title: Indian girls likely face violence from mothers Unicef
item.description: Indian mothers and stepmothers are those mostly likely to subject their daughters to physical violence according to a Unicef report that raises the issues of corporal punishment and discipline
item.itunes:subtitle: Indian mothers and stepmothers are those mostly likely to subject their daughters to physical violence according to a Unicef report that raises the issues of corporal punishment and discipline
item.itunes:summary: Indian mothers and stepmothers are those mostly likely to subject their daughters to physical violence according to a Unicef report that raises the issues of corporal punishment and discipline

item.title: India Australia to sign nuke deal for uranium sale
item.description: Australian Prime Minister Tony Abbott met prime minister Narendra Modi at the beginning of his twoday state visit during which they are expected to sign the deal to allow the export of uranium to New Delhi for use in power generation
item.itunes:subtitle: Australian Prime Minister Tony Abbott met prime minister Narendra Modi at the beginning of his twoday state visit during which they are expected to sign the deal to allow the export of uranium to New Delhi for use in power generation
item.itunes:summary: Australian Prime Minister Tony Abbott met prime minister Narendra Modi at the beginning of his twoday state visit during which they are expected to sign the deal to allow the export of uranium to New Delhi for use in power generation

item.title: Australian PM to return stolen statues to PM Modi
item.description: Australias prime minister will on Friday hand back to his Indian counterpart two statues allegedly looted from ancient temples ending a longrunning battle over the pieces his office said
item.itunes:subtitle: Australias prime minister will on Friday hand back to his Indian counterpart two statues allegedly looted from ancient temples ending a longrunning battle over the pieces his office said
item.itunes:summary: Australias prime minister will on Friday hand back to his Indian counterpart two statues allegedly looted from ancient temples ending a longrunning battle over the pieces his office said

item.title: Lucknow madarsas to screen Modis Teachers Day speech
item.description: Several Lucknowbased madarsas are preparing to screen Prime Minister Narendra Modis Teachers Day speech to students on Friday Accordingly TV sets have been installed in these madarsas in the Uttar Pradesh capital
item.itunes:subtitle: Several Lucknowbased madarsas are preparing to screen Prime Minister Narendra Modis Teachers Day speech to students on Friday Accordingly TV sets have been installed in these madarsas in the Uttar Pradesh capital
item.itunes:summary: Several Lucknowbased madarsas are preparing to screen Prime Minister Narendra Modis Teachers Day speech to students on Friday Accordingly TV sets have been installed in these madarsas in the Uttar Pradesh capital

item.title: Country ready to tackle al Qaeda threat IAF chief
item.description: IAF chief Arup Raha said on Friday there was a threat from terror groups such as Al Qaeda but the country is ready to tackle such outfits
item.itunes:subtitle: IAF chief Arup Raha said on Friday there was a threat from terror groups such as Al Qaeda but the country is ready to tackle such outfits
item.itunes:summary: IAF chief Arup Raha said on Friday there was a threat from terror groups such as Al Qaeda but the country is ready to tackle such outfits

item.title: Flood situation grim in JK rescue efforts on
item.description: Flood situation on Friday worsened in Kashmir Valley where River Jhelum was flowing above the danger mark even as the Army and NDRF have been called in to assist the administration in relief and rescue efforts in the state where 20 persons have died while another 45 are feared dead

item.title: Delhi likely to get BJP govt AAP cries foul
item.description: Amid reports that lieutenant governor Najeeb Jung may invite the BJP to form government in Delhi AAP leader Manish Sisodia said on Friday that the saffron party did not have the courage to face fresh elections
item.itunes:subtitle: Amid reports that lieutenant governor Najeeb Jung may invite the BJP to form government in Delhi AAP leader Manish Sisodia said on Friday that the saffron party did not have the courage to face fresh elections
item.itunes:summary: Amid reports that lieutenant governor Najeeb Jung may invite the BJP to form government in Delhi AAP leader Manish Sisodia said on Friday that the saffron party did not have the courage to face fresh elections

item.title: SC orders release of undertrials who have served half their term
item.description: The Supreme Court on Friday ordered overcrowded jails to free all undertrials who have served half their maximum term a landmark ruling that marks the Narendra Modi governments first step towards judicial reform

item.title: Former CJI Sathasivam sworn in as Kerala governor
item.description: Former Chief Justice of India P Sathasivam was sworn in as Kerala governor on Friday He was administered the oath of office by acting chief justice of the Kerala High Court justice Ashok Bhushan at the Raj Bhavan in Thiruvananthapuram
item.itunes:subtitle: Former Chief Justice of India P Sathasivam was sworn in as Kerala governor on Friday He was administered the oath of office by acting chief justice of the Kerala High Court justice Ashok Bhushan at the Raj Bhavan in Thiruvananthapuram
item.itunes:summary: Former Chief Justice of India P Sathasivam was sworn in as Kerala governor on Friday He was administered the oath of office by acting chief justice of the Kerala High Court justice Ashok Bhushan at the Raj Bhavan in Thiruvananthapuram

item.title: Aus PM Abbott offers uranium coal to energystarved India
item.description: Australian Prime Minister Tony Abbott said he would seal a civil nuclear deal to sell uranium to India on Friday offering to ramp up supplies of energy to help the emerging Asian giant overcome chronic shortages
item.itunes:subtitle: Australian Prime Minister Tony Abbott said he would seal a civil nuclear deal to sell uranium to India on Friday offering to ramp up supplies of energy to help the emerging Asian giant overcome chronic shortages
item.itunes:summary: Australian Prime Minister Tony Abbott said he would seal a civil nuclear deal to sell uranium to India on Friday offering to ramp up supplies of energy to help the emerging Asian giant overcome chronic shortages
